newProperties.name: Album Title
newProperties.description: The title of the album

newProperties.name: Album Artist
newProperties.description: The artist, composer, band or group that published the album.

newProperties.name: Album Cover
newProperties.description: URL to album cover art thumbnail: NOTE: Should be an https link to a square image, between 1400x1400 and 3000x3000 pixels, in JPEG or PNG format.

newProperties.name: About the Album
newProperties.description: Information about the album and artist.

newProperties.name: Year of Release
newProperties.description: The year the album was first released.

newProperties.name: Month of Release
newProperties.description: The month the album was first released.

newProperties.name: Date of Release
newProperties.description: The date the album was first released.

newProperties.name: Genre
newProperties.description: The genre(s) of the album.

newProperties.name: Mood
newProperties.description: The mood(s) of the album.

newProperties.name: Theme
newProperties.description: The theme(s) of the album.

newProperties.name: Tracks
newProperties.description: The tracks of the album.

newProperties.name: Language
newProperties.description: The language of the song lyrics in the album.

newProperties.name: Link
newProperties.description: Links to the artist or album site or social media pages.

newProperties.name: Lyrics
newProperties.description: Link to the album tracks lyrics.

newProperties.name: Composer/songriter
newProperties.description: The composer(s) and/or songwriter(s) of the album.

newProperties.name: Reviews
newProperties.description: Links to reviews of the album.

newProperties.name: Publication Status
newProperties.description: The publication status of the album.

newProperties.name: Curation Status
newProperties.description: The publication status of the album set by the a content curator on the platform.

newProperties.name: Explicit
newProperties.description: Indicates whether the track contains explicit material.

newProperties.name: License
newProperties.description: The license of which the album is released under.
